    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectParameter

        public SelectParameter(java.util.List<java.lang.String> options,
               int[] selOptions,
               java.lang.String type)
        SelectParameter class constructor
        Parameters:
        options - - Array of options to be displayed in the select field
        selOptions - - Position of the options that should be displayed as selected
        type - - Type of selection: single or multiple

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
        Array of String with the options of the select field

      • getSelOptions

        public int[] getSelOptions()
        Get method for selOptions member
        Returns:
        Array of int with the position of the selected options

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get method for type member
        Returns:
        String indicating if the select allows single or multiple options to be selected

        public void setType(java.lang.String type)
        Set method for type member
        Parameters:

      • getOption

        public java.lang.String getOption(int pos)
        Method to get the value of a given option
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the option to be returned
        Returns:
        String value of the option required

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(int pos)
        Method that indicates if an option is selected
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the option that needs to be validated
        Returns:
        true if the options is selected, false otherwise

      • isSingle

        public boolean isSingle()
        Method that indicates if the selection is single
        Returns:
        true if one single option can be selected, false otherwise

      • isMultiple

        public boolean isMultiple()
        Method that indicates if the selection is multiple
        Returns:
        true if multiple options can be selected, false otherwise

      • getSelected

        public java.lang.String getSelected()
        Method that returns the value or the list of values of the selected options
        Returns:
        String with the selected option/s. If the type of the parameter is single, it just returns the value of the option. If the type of the parameter is multiple, it returns a list with all the options: ("opt1", "opt2", "opt3").
